title: Fed Minutes, Senate’s Bill Supporting Hong Kong Protesters, Amtrak’s Plan for Profitability
itunes:title: Fed Minutes, Senate’s Bill Supporting Hong Kong Protesters, Amtrak’s Plan for Profitability
description:
Tendayi Kapfidze, Chief Economist at LendingTree, breaks down Fed Minutes and eco outlook. Clayton Allen, VP of Special Situations at Height Capital Markets, discusses whether the Senate's bill supporting Hong Kong protesters will impact trade negotiations with China. Patrick Little, General Manager of Qualcomm Global Automotive, talks about what's next for mobility innovation. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior U.S. Retail Analyst Poonam Goyal and Joe Feldman, Senior Retail Analyst at Telsey Advisory Group, provide insight on Target earnings and the overall retail outlook. Businessweek Projects and Investigations Reporter Devin Leonard walks through Amtrak's unlikeable plan for profitability. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at RDM Financial Group.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
